segments.text: Reservation Center , Air China . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I'm coming to confirm my ticket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My name is Zu Ping . In fact , I have a reservation on Flight No . 125 for Zhenjiang , leaving Beijing at 2:00 p . m . tomorrow . Now I'd like to make a change of my travel schedule . Is it possible to change my booking to the day after tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a seat available on the same flight the day after tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . You are reconfirmed on Flight No . 125 for Zhenjiang , leaving Beijing at 2:00 p . m . on January 15th .
segments.speaker: S1
